question: The main reason for implementing appropriate levels of abstraction is because:

options.A: Not all stakeholders find value in the entire set of requirements
options.B: Requirements do not have necessary attributes

question: Which of the following activities are performed during the requirements life cycle management phase?
What tool is used by a business analyst (BA) for quality control when verifying requirements and designs?
What is a logical data model used for?

options.A: Abstracting a "conceptual data model" to incorporate the rules of normalization to manage data integrity and relationships
options.B: Abstracting a "physical data model" to describe the physical organization of data and its relationships within a database
options.C: Defining the logical rules that govern decisions in an organization and that define, constrain, or enable organizational operations.
options.D: Defining a solution independent view of how a business perceives its information without applying any constraints.

question: Which of the following is an activity that a business analyst (BA) performs to prepare for elicitation?

options.A: At the very beginning of an initiative only
options.B: After the maintain requirements and trace requirements tasks have been completed
options.D: After the maintain requirements task has been completed

question: Which of the following is the integrated output that correctly reflects captured information agreed to by business analysts (BAs) and other stakeholders?
An atomic requirement:

options.A: is understood independently of other requirements or designs.
options.B: contains no extraneous or unnecessary content.
options.C: uses common terminology understood by the audience.
options.D: aligns with the identified needs of the stakeholders.

question: In the define design options task, which of the following relates to the identify improvement opportunities element?

options.A: Assess issues, define risks, confirm elicitation results
options.B: Create flow diagrams, purchase solutions components, secure resources
options.C: Increase efficiencies, identify additional capabilities, improve access to information
options.D: Define change strategy, analyze current state, prioritize requirements

options.A: in any capacity, regardless of job title.
options.B: in a project team, with an "analyst” job title.
options.C: in a project team, regardless of job title.
options.D: in any capacity, with an "analyst” job title.

question: Which of the following prioritization factors considers consequences resulting from not implementing a requirement?

options.A: Requirements without direct ties to a particular tool
options.C: Requirements at low levels of abstraction
options.D: Requirements with specific references to departments

question: Video conferencing, electronic calendars, and electronic voting are examples of:

options.B: Comparing a model with another relevant model

question: When can a change to requirements occur?

options.A: As soon as the testing process has begun
options.B: At any time during the project lifecycle
options.C: Only after requirements have been approved
options.D: Only after the solution has been designed

question: What is Testable characteristic of Verify Requirements in the Requirements Analysis and Design Definition?

options.A: Reasonable and possible within the agreed-upon risk, schedule, and budget,or considered feasible enough to investigate further through.
options.B: Able to verify that the requirement or design has been fulfilled. Acceptable levels of everifying fulfillment depen on the level of abstraction of the requirement or design.
options.C: Aligned with the identified needs of the stakeholders and not conflicting with other requirements.
options.D: Self-contained and capable of being understood independently of other requirements or designs.

Which input is used to prepare for elicitation?

options.B: Recommend actions to increase solution value
options.C: Analyze potential value and recommend solution

options.B: Identifying non-financial benefits of the brainstormed solutions.
